alert.note: Alert for Alcona; Arenac; Gladwin; Iosco; Ogemaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 22 at 3:16PM EST until December 24 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with locally up to 10 inches possible in higher terrain away from the Lake Huron shoreline. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Alcona, Ogemaw, Iosco, Gladwin and Arenac Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible at times, particularly early Friday morning through Friday evening. Blowing and drifting snow can result in white-out conditions and snow- covered roads. North-south roads will be especially impacted by crosswinds and heavy drifting. The hazardous conditions will impact holiday commuters. Strong winds with snow-covered trees could bring down branches and cause power outages.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
